column3: A brief description of the purpose of the KPI and the sources of information it is based on. Details of specific calculations will be recorded within the "formula" field
The class of things that use this KPI, such as Services, Projects, People, etc.
At what level of access is the KPI score or value relevant - Global, EU - E-RIHS, National - French, National - Greek, Institutional - National Gallery, Personal etc.
A controlled list: Project, Access, Examination, Hour, Day, Month, Year, etc.
A controlled list or conditions, such as: exist, be greater than, be less than, be equal to ....

Optional period over which the recorded values are valid, this will probably be used to define the relevant year or access period, metrics related to specific events will already have a defined period.
